009package imagingbook.common.math.exception;
010
011/**
012 * Exception indicating a floating-point division by zero (or some
013 * denominator too small to yield a finite result).
014 *  
015 * @author WB
016 *
017 */
018public class DivideByZeroException extends ArithmeticException {
019        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
020        private static String DefaultMessage = "zero denominator in division";
021        
022        public DivideByZeroException() {
023                super(DefaultMessage);
024        }
025}
